description: This dashboard works with postgres_exporter for prometheus

panels.description: The average query duration
panels.title: Query Latency

panels.description: Number of queries per second
panels.title: Queries Per Second

panels.description: Total number of active pg bouncer client connections
panels.title: Active Clients

panels.description: Total fetched tuples from the database
panels.title: Fetch

panels.description: Total inserted tuples in the database
panels.title: Insert

panels.description: Total updated tuples in the database
panels.title: Current update data

panels.description: PG bouncer active client and server connections
panels.title: Active Connections

panels.description: PG bouncer waiting client connections
panels.title: Waiting Connections

panels.description: PG bouncer idle server connections
panels.title: Idle Connections

panels.description: PG bouncer bind connection count
panels.title: Connection Bind

panels.description: PG bouncer connection assignment count
panels.title: Client Assignment

panels.description: PG bouncer queries per second
panels.title: Queries Per Second

panels.description: PG bouncer prepared statement parse count
panels.title: Statement Parse Count

panels.description: Average query time for PG bouncer pool connections
panels.title: Average Query Time

panels.description: PG bouncer total transferred/received bytes
panels.title: Throughput

panels.description: Transaction commit/rollback count
panels.title: Transactions

panels.description: Count of buffer writes by backends, background writer, and checkpoints, and new buffer allocations
panels.title: Buffers

panels.description: Count of conflicts and deadlocks
panels.title: Conflicts/Deadlocks

panels.description: Count of active locks broken down by lock type
panels.title: Lock tables

panels.description: Time spent writing buffers to disk
panels.title: Checkpoint Stats

panels.description: Bytes of data written to temporary files by queries
panels.title: Temp File (Bytes) Per Second

panels.description: Total fetched tuples from the database
panels.title: Fetch data (SELECT)

panels.description: Total returned tuples from the database
panels.title: Return data

panels.description: Total inserted tuples in the database
panels.title: Insert data

panels.description: Total updated tuples in the database
panels.title: Update data

panels.description: Total deleted tuples from the database
panels.title: Delete data

panels.description: Percentage of disk blocks accessed directly from shared_buffer cache

targets.expr: avg(pg_stat_database_blks_hit_total{cluster=~"$cluster", datname=~"$database", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}/ (pg_stat_database_blks_read_total{cluster=~"$cluster", datname=~"$database", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}+ pg_stat_database_blks_hit_total{cluster=~"$cluster", datname=~"$database", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"})) by (datname)

panels.title: Cache Hit Rate

panels.description: the number of seconds replica is behind the leader
panels.title: Replication Lag

panels.description: the size, in bytes, replica is behind the leader
panels.title: Replication Lag Size

panels.description: The rate of log events written by the database
panels.title: Rate

panels.description: The log events
panels.title: Messages

list.description: Name of the Prometheus datasource to use
list.label: Prometheus
list.name: prometheus

list.description: Name of the Loki datasource to use
list.label: Loki
list.name: loki

title: PostgreSQL
